channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Delta is adding the Boeing 787 Dreamliner to its fleet, buying 30 new planes
item.description: Delta Air Lines announced a major aircraft order: It's buying 30 of Boeing's largest 787-10 Dreamliners.

item.title: The ultimate guide to Princess Cruises ships and itineraries
item.description: Everything you need to know about Princess Cruises ships and the places the line sails.

item.title: Equal best-ever offer: How good is the Citi / AAdvantage Executive World Elite Mastercard 100K-mile bonus?
item.description: The Citi / AAdvantage Executive card is offering 100,000 bonus miles for a welcome offer. Here's why now is such a great time to apply.

item.title: New push would cap credit card interest rates at 10%: Here's what we know
item.description: President Donald Trump called for a 10% cap on credit card interest rates starting Jan. 20. Here's what we know.

item.title: Credit card transfer bonuses (January): 15% bonus to Avianca LifeMiles
item.description: Here's a look at all the current transfer bonuses involving major credit cards and airline and hotel loyalty programs.
